title: Song of the Garden

tokens.lyric: The Lord into His garden comes;
The spices yield a rich perfume;
The lilies grow and thrive, the lilies grow and thrive.

lines.raw: [G]The lilies grow and thrive, the lilies grow and thrive.

tokens.lyric: From the Father flow to every vine,

lines.raw: [D]From the Father flow to every vine,

tokens.lyric: And make the dead revive, and make the dead revive.

lines.raw: [Bm]And make the dead revive, and make the dead revive.

tokens.lyric: Oh that this dry and barren ground

lines.raw: [D7]Oh that this dry and barren ground

tokens.lyric: In springs of water may abound;
A fruitful soil become, a fruitful soil become.

lines.raw: [D]A fruitful soil become, a fruitful soil become.

tokens.lyric: The desert blossoms as the rose,
When the Saviour conquers all his foes,

lines.raw: [A7]When the Saviour conquers all his foes,

tokens.lyric: And makes His people one, and makes His people one.

lines.raw: [D]And makes His people one, and makes His people one.

tokens.lyric: Come brethren you that love the Lord,

lines.raw: [Bm]Come brethren you that love the Lord,

tokens.lyric: And taste the sweetness of His word;

lines.raw: [G]And taste the sweetness of His word;

tokens.lyric: In Father's ways go on, in Father's ways go on,

lines.raw: [A7]In Father's ways go on, in Father's ways go on,

tokens.lyric: Our trouble and our trials here,
Will only make us richer there,
When we arrive at home, when we arrive at home.

lines.raw: [A7]When we arrive at home, when we arrive at home.
